title: The Kings want YOU
body:
Hey all,

I'm currently recruiting for an up and coming ranked 5s team for my clan, Bound in Graphics.
We're a humble bunch and are looking for players ranked Silver to Gold.
If you're above or below the requirements you shan't be considered, Silver V is a minimum requirement for the team.

Playing in this team is about connecting with other like minded people and having a community to belong to and play with.
It will involve regular play sessions with a particular focus on improvement, being comprised of lower-middle tier players.

If you could fill this out and/or drop me a friend request I'd greatly appreciate it.

ROLE:
RANK:
COMMS Y/N:
AVAILABILITY:
BEST 3 CHAMPS IN ROLE:

Thanks guys, let me know if you have any questions- I look forward to playing with you!
